title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2604.1 - Cash drawdown requests and financial reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2604.1 - Cash drawdown requests and financial reports

State Regulations
(a) Four cash drawdown requests are required
each contract year; the first request shall cover the three-month period
beginning with the effective date of the contract. All requests and required
attachments are due six weeks prior to the beginning of each quarter. (b) Financial reports providing actual
accrued expenses are required for each of the first three quarters, six weeks
after the completion of said quarter. Each report shall be cumulative. The
annual financial report shall be submitted in lieu of the fourth financial
quarterly report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2604.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
